short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up definitions of Greek/Latin words conveniently in your browser. Not affiliated with Perseus Digital Library.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This lightweight extension allows you to quickly look up the definitions of Greek and Latin words directly in the browser using Perseus Digital Library.
